title: `@TestHTTPResource` should also consider `quarkus.http.root-path`

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

Currently, the `@TestHTTPResource` annotation doesn't appear to respect the `quarkus.http.root-path` config. I.e. an injected path is not resolved against that root, but always against `/`.

### Expected behavior

The injected path should be a path that is prefixed with `quarkus.http.root-path`.

### Actual behavior

See description.
